title: Blender
description: Open-source 3D computer graphics software used for creating animated films, visual effects, art, 3D models, and interactive 3D applications.

title: Affinity Photo
description: Professional photo editing software with RAW processing, retouching tools, and support for PSD files. A popular alternative to Photoshop.

title: DaVinci Resolve
description: Professional video editing, color correction, visual effects, and audio post-production software all in one tool.

title: Sketch
description: Vector graphics editor focused on user interface and user experience design for websites and mobile apps.

title: Sublime Text
description: Sophisticated text editor for code, markup, and prose with a slick UI and extraordinary performance.

title: Obsidian
description: Powerful knowledge base that works on local Markdown files. Create a web of interconnected notes to organize your thoughts.

title: Discord
description: Voice, video, and text chat platform designed specifically for gaming communities but now used by many different groups.

title: Apple Music
description: Music and video streaming service offering over 90 million songs, worldwide radio stations, and exclusive releases.

title: GitKraken
description: Powerful Git GUI client for Windows, Mac & Linux with intuitive drag & drop interface and built-in merge conflict resolution.

title: Luminar Neo
description: AI-powered photo editor with tools for sky replacement, portrait enhancement, object removal, and creative effects.
